[Blocker] (After an opponent's attack, you may switch this card to Rest Mode and change the target of the attack to this card.)
[When KO'd] Switch 1 [Field] in your Battle Area to Rest Mode : Play this card from its owner's Drop.

name: Ribet
effect:
[Auto] When this card is used in a combo from the Battle Area, play up to 1 <Super Sigma> with a cost of 2 from your hand.
[Activate Main] Switch this card to Rest Mode : Draw 1 card. Then, discard 1 card from your hand.

name: General Rilldo
effect:
[On Play] Add up to 1 card from your life to your hand.
[Auto] When this card is used in a combo from the Battle Area, play up to 1 <Hyper Meta-Rilldo> with a cost of 3 from your hand.

name: New Planet Tuffle
effect:
[Field] (This card remains in your Battle Area until you place another [Field].)
[Activate Main] Discard 1 card from your hand and switch this card to Rest Mode : If your Leader has 《Machine Mutant》 in its special traits, draw 1 card.

name: Super Galick Gun
effect: [Activate Battle] Your cards that are in a battle get +25000 power for the battle. Then, if you have a card in your Combo Area, choose up to 1 Battle Card with a cost of 3 or less and return it to its owner's hand.

name: Revenge Death Ball
effect: [Activate Main] If you have 3 or more Battle Cards with 《Brainwashed》 or 《Machine Mutant》 in their special traits in your Drop, your Leader with 《Machine Mutant》 in its special traits gets +5000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Son Goku
effect:
[On Play] Until the end of your opponent's next turn, negate the next damage you take.
[When Attacking] Choose all of your opponent's Battle Cards and they get -20000 power for the turn.

name: Son Goku
effect:
[On Play] Until the end of your opponent's next turn, negate the next damage you take.
[When Attacking] Choose all of your opponent's Battle Cards and they get -20000 power for the turn.

name: Son Goku
effect:
[On Play] Until the end of your opponent's next turn, negate the next damage you take.
[When Attacking] Choose all of your opponent's Battle Cards and they get -20000 power for the turn.

name: Vegito
effect:
[Permanent] Having 0 cards in your deck does not cause you to lose the game, and if you have 0 cards in your deck, this card gets +10000 power.
[Activate Main][Once per turn] Switch this card to Active Mode, then choose up to 1 card in your opponent's Battle Area and return it to its owner's hand. Then, place the top 5 cards of your deck into their owner's Drop.

name: Vegito
effect:
[Permanent] Having 0 cards in your deck does not cause you to lose the game, and if you have 0 cards in your deck, this card gets +10000 power.
[Activate Main][Once per turn] Switch this card to Active Mode, then choose up to 1 card in your opponent's Battle Area and return it to its owner's hand. Then, place the top 5 cards of your deck into their owner's Drop.

name: Special Beam Cannon
effect: [Activate Main] Choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and KO it. Then, if you have 8 or more energy, choose your Leader or up to 1 of your Battle Cards and it gets +30000 power for the turn.

name: Final Explosion
effect: [Activate Main] Choose all of your opponent's Battle Cards with costs of 3 or less and switch them to Rest Mode. Then, choose up to 2 of your opponent's Rest Mode Battle Cards with costs of 4 or less and KO them.

name: 10x Kamehameha
effect: [Activate Main] Choose one―・Choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards with a cost of 2 or less and KO it.・If you removed an energy marker to use this card, choose up to 2 of your opponent's Battle Cards with costs of 3 or less and KO them.

name: Shin (Mini) : DA
effect: [Activate Main] Place this card into its owner's Drop : Choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and it gets -10000 power for the turn.

name: Bulma (Mini) : DA
effect: [On Play] Add up to 1 card from your life to your hand. Then, if you have 7 or fewer cards in your hand, draw 1 card.

name: Piccolo (Mini) : DA
effect: [On Play] Place 1 card from your energy into its owner's Drop : Choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards with a cost of 3 or less and KO it.

name: King Gomah : DA
effect:
[On Play] Add up to 1 card from your life to your hand.
[When Attacking][Once per turn] Switch this card to Active Mode.

name: Glorio : DA
effect:
[Permanent] If you or your opponent has an energy marker, reduce the cost of this card in your hand by 2.
[On Play] If your opponent has an energy marker, draw 1 card.
